name: Power Plants
intro_text:
A huge amount of the energy the world uses is generated in power plants, supplying electricity and heat to cities, factories and power grids worldwide.

IPCC scenarios to net zero involve electrification of transport and industry. Coal power should be phased out completely by 2030 in OECD countries and worldwide by 2040.

To understand the landscape of power plants we present some key datasets below.
